import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Generate a new Chat Token"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/tokens"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Generate a Chat Token to be used to authenticate clients to the Chat Service.


#### Permissions

The API token must include the following scopes: `Chat`.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["ttl","channels"],"properties":{"ttl":{"type":"integer","example":60,"minimum":1,"maximum":43200,"description":"The maximum time, in minutes, that the access token will be valid for. Between 1 and 43,200 (30 days)."},"channels":{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{"type":"object","properties":{"read":{"type":"boolean","example":true,"description":"Gives the token read access to the channel."},"write":{"type":"boolean","example":false,"description":"Gives the token write access to the channel."}},"required":["read","write"]},"example":{"channel1":{"read":true,"write":true},"channel2":{"read":true,"write":false}},"description":"User-defined channel names. Each channel is a object with `read` and `write` properties.\nMax of 500 channels inside main `channels`. Either `read`, `write`, or both are required inside each channel and default to `false`.\nEach channel name can be up to 250 characters. Must be valid JSON.","title":"ChatChannel"},"member_id":{"type":"string","example":"3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6","description":"The unique identifier of the member. Up to 250 characters. If not specified, a random UUID will be generated."},"state":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","additionalProperties":{},"example":{"key":"value","key2":"value2"},"description":"An arbitrary JSON object available to store stateful application information in. Must be valid JSON and have a maximum size of 2,000 characters.","title":"ChatState"}],"description":"An arbitrary JSON object available to store stateful application information in. Must be valid JSON and have a maximum size of 2,000 characters."}},"title":"NewChatToken"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
